covid.text: It's now pretty clear that social distancing and travel restrictions prevent this party from happening in 2020. We are postponing by exactly a year! ‚è≥

homepage.intro1:
After many years we have decided to take official steps. Come celebrate with us in Kashubia!

More details will follow here later - save the date until then!
homepage.intro2: The main celebration will happen on Saturday the 19th.
